participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

rel_family_id.Description: Family ID (participants belonging to the same family share a family ID). The family ID is autocalculated and will change after the addition/removal of subjects from the ABCD study. Family IDs will, therefore, differ between data releases

rel_birth_id.Description: Birth event ID determined by rel_family_id and unique birthdates within rel_family_id groups

rel_group_id.Description: Group ID (twins and triplets in the same family share a group ID)

rel_ingroup_order.Description: In-Group Order ID (twins and triplets in the same family and in the same group have different values)

rel_relationship.Description: Relationship of the participant in his or her family | 0 = single; 1 = sibling; 2 = twin; 3 = triplet

genetic_pi_hat_1.Description: Probability of identity by descend between participant and genetic_paired_subjectid_1

genetic_pi_hat_2.Description: Probability of identity by descend between participant and genetic_paired_subjectid_2

genetic_pi_hat_3.Description: Probability of identity by descend between participant and genetic_paired_subjectid_3

genetic_pi_hat_4.Description: Probability of identity by descend between participant and genetic_paired_subjectid_4

genetic_zygosity_status_1.Description: Genetically inferred zygosity status between participant and genetic_paired_subjectid_1 | 1= monozygotic ; 2= dizygotic ; 3=siblings ;-1= not available (twins/sibs, genetic_pi_hat not calculated)

genetic_zygosity_status_2.Description: Genetically inferred zygosity status between participant and genetic_paired_subjectid_2 | 1= monozygotic ; 2= dizygotic ; 3=siblings ;-1= not available (twins/sibs, genetic_pi_hat not calculated)

genetic_zygosity_status_3.Description: Genetically inferred zygosity status between participant and genetic_paired_subjectid_3 | 1= monozygotic ; 2= dizygotic ; 3=siblings ;-1= not available (twins/sibs, genetic_pi_hat not calculated)

genetic_zygosity_status_4.Description: Genetically inferred zygosity status between participant and genetic_paired_subjectid_4 | 1= monozygotic ; 2= dizygotic ; 3=siblings ;-1= not available (twins/sibs, genetic_pi_hat not calculated)

genetic_paired_subjectid_1.Description: Genetically related with participant based on genetic_pi_hat_1

genetic_paired_subjectid_2.Description: Genetically related with participant based on genetic_pi_hat_2

genetic_paired_subjectid_3.Description: Genetically related with participant based on genetic_pi_hat_3

genetic_paired_subjectid_4.Description: Genetically related with participant based on genetic_pi_hat_4

genetic_pc_1.Description: First principal component of genetic ancestry

genetic_pc_2.Description: Second principal component of genetic ancestry

genetic_pc_3.Description: Third principal component of genetic ancestry

genetic_pc_4.Description: Fourth principal component of genetic ancestry

genetic_pc_5.Description: Fifth principal component of genetic ancestry

genetic_pc_6.Description: Sixth principal component of genetic ancestry

genetic_pc_7.Description: Seventh principal component of genetic ancestry

genetic_pc_8.Description: Eighth  principal component of genetic ancestry

genetic_pc_9.Description: Ninth principal component of genetic ancestry

genetic_pc_10.Description: Tenth principal component of genetic ancestry

genetic_pc_11.Description: Eleventh principal component of genetic ancestry

genetic_pc_12.Description: Twelfth principal component of genetic ancestry

genetic_pc_13.Description: Thirteenth principal component of genetic ancestry

genetic_pc_14.Description: Fourteenth principal component of genetic ancestry

genetic_pc_15.Description: Fifteenth principal component of genetic ancestry

genetic_pc_16.Description: Sixteenth principal component of genetic ancestry

genetic_pc_17.Description: Seventeenth principal component of genetic ancestry

genetic_pc_18.Description: Eighteenth principal component of genetic ancestry

genetic_pc_19.Description: Nineteenth principal component of genetic ancestry

genetic_pc_20.Description: Twentieth principal component of genetic ancestry

genetic_pc_21.Description: Twenty-first principal component of genetic ancestry

genetic_pc_22.Description: Twenty-second principal component of genetic ancestry

genetic_pc_23.Description: Twenty-third principal component of genetic ancestry

genetic_pc_24.Description: Twenty-fourth principal component of genetic ancestry

genetic_pc_25.Description: Twenty-fifth principal component of genetic ancestry

genetic_pc_26.Description: Twenty-sixth principal component of genetic ancestry

genetic_pc_27.Description: Twenty-seventh principal component of genetic ancestry

genetic_pc_32.Description: Thirty-second principal component of genetic ancestry
